summary:
New research evaluating the effectiveness of reward modeling during Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF): “SEAL: Systematic Error Analysis for Value ALignment. ” The paper introduces quantitative metrics for evaluating the effectiveness of modeling and aligning human values:
Abstract: Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) aims to align language models (LMs) with human values by training reward models (RMs) on binary preferences and using these RMs to fine-tune the base LMs.  Despite its importance, the internal mechanisms of RLHF remain poorly understood...
title: Evaluating the Effectiveness of Reward Modeling of Generative AI Systems
